name: Fruitz! Juicy Endless Runner
description:
Welcome to Fruitz game! In Fruitz! game you can relax yourself and play this endless touch swipe runner. Help escape the apple from this Fruitz! world.

Move your apple left and right using swipe touches.

Avoid obstacles.

Collect coins.

Features:

+ well designed levels

+ funny fruit graphic

+ lovely music

+ avoid bananas

+ avoid watermelons

+ avoid peanuts

+ collect 3 different types of coins

+ difficulty level rises as levels progress

Dont wait and too long and play Fruitz! Juicy Endless Runner
